prompt:
¿Cuál es la mejor forma de completar el espacio en blanco 12?

La mayoría de las escuelas ![dropdown:Drop_Down_703_84] experiencia con pizarras interactivas.
feedback: The correct answer is "haven’t had any." La oración debería decir: “Most schools haven’t had any experience with interactive whiteboards.” This question asks you to choose the correct phrase in standard English. The word “ain’t” is non-standard English and so is “haven’t had no.” People might use non-standard English in casual conversation, but in formal writing such as a business letter, the correct phrase is “haven’t had any.”
